channel.title: How come spirit shields are different icon?
channel.description:
I added spirit shields in my server and client but it shows up as some tree icon thing and when i wield it it looks like floating red balls. kinda weird.. I added the model and ints
Can somebody please tell me what is wrong?

item.title: How come spirit shields are different icon?
item.dc:creator: @f0r_th3_l0s3 f0r_th3_l0s3
item.description:
@f0r_th3_l0s3 wrote:

not workiing still same tree icon

Read full topic
item.source: How come spirit shields are different icon?

item.title: How come spirit shields are different icon?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:302720”]Sure thing, you didnt add the models, and this should be in the client section. Look in client.java of the client and look on how to add the models, usally ::addmodels.[/quote] No its usually:

add model (model id)

exactly like that, no parentheses

Read full topic
item.source: How come spirit shields are different icon?

item.title: How come spirit shields are different icon?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Sure thing, you didnt add the models, and this should be in the client section. Look in client.java of the client and look on how to add the models, usally ::addmodels.

Read full topic
